channel.title: .net on byteloom - Marek Mierzwa
channel.description: Recent content in .net on byteloom - Marek Mierzwa

item.title: Scheduling in ASP.NET Core with Quartz.NET
item.description: Running certain tasks in a scheduled manner may be an easy solution for many problems. One might be refreshing the application cache when the data needs to be fresh and warm no matter what the actual traffic is.

item.title: Under the hood
item.description: It’s always good to have static code analysis in your build process. I guess no one these days argues with this statement.

item.title: Custom XmlResolver for embeded DTD
item.description: Writing a component for parsing XML files with XMLSerializer I had to provide DTD validation (DTD file was already created long time ago so there was no sense for creating XSD schema).

item.title: Ingo Rammer - Hardcore .NET Production Debugging
item.description: Have you ever had a problem with a user complaining on and on that when he clicks some button in your application his computer hangs but it works fine on any other machine where you have tested it?
